website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Chameleon 7 Limit Mid Waterproof is widely praised for delivering comfort. Its versatility, broken-in feel, surface grip, craftsmanship, and support are also recognized. But despite the positive attributes, it is heavily criticized for is its narrowness. As a whole, potential buyers are advised to visit stores to test pairs of Chameleon 7 Limit Mid Waterproof to find the right fit so they can also enjoy its positive attributes on their next hiking adventures.
pros: A majority of hikers attest to the comfort granted by the Merrell Chameleon 7 Limit Mid Waterproof
Several individuals share that they also wear this boot for other activities apart from hiking
Many people say that the Chameleon 7 Limit Mid WP doesn’t require any breaking in
A good number of buyers report that this hiking gear has afforded them an excellent grip on different surfaces
This above-the-ankle boot has impressed numerous customers with its remarkable waterproofing
A few outdoor lovers appreciate the stylish look of this footgear
Tens of users have noticed that the footgear is well-built
A handful of purchasers love the decent arch support offered by the Chameleon 7 Limit Mid Waterproof
cons: A considerable number of buyers find this hiking boot too narrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  stylish,  great value walking boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the most comfortable boots I have ever had. I was a Salomon wearer but after getting these I will stick to Merrill from now on. Tgey are very roomy in the toe box which is good if you have wider feet, they are also very flexible & comfortable. Buy with confidence and always remember to buy a half size bigger than you normally wear. Just to add they look stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: JUBS

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered a size 9 because that's my size; I should have read the previous reviews first because they were too small. Re-ordered a 91/2 and the fit is perfect. Very comfortable boots; I have had to use an orthotic insole with other boots but so far haven't needed to do so with these. Also brilliant turn-around service on the relacement pair from Amazon - handed over the original order to the courier on Saturday, the repacements were delivered on Monday!
customer_reviews.author: P Turner

customer_reviews.title: Merrell - Consistant high quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 9.5 as I have wider feet. (Sure they just send a 9) lovely comfy pair of boots. Worn for 12-13 hours at a time and still comfy. I wear thinner socks which is fine as I have wider feet. If wearing for walking in winter I may suggest going up a size if like me you have pasties instead of feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Men's Cham 7 Limit Mid Wp High Rise Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Used hiking with walking club in Co.Down on all sorts of surfaces from Bit-Mac to mountain climbing and found them very comfortable, waterproof and good protection for ankles, etcetera. Happy with these boots and have no hesitation in recommending both them and the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: dromarakid

customer_reviews.title: This is obviously a manufacturing error.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot, just what I expect from Merrell. Unfortunately, in the right boot, the top part of the heel material turns down as you put your foot in, and it is difficult to correct that when it happens. It feels as thought part of the internal material is missing. I also missed the return window otherwise they would have been returned for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: jasmacq

customer_reviews.title: Shape is not good
customer_reviews.text: Shape is not good. Especially the front side is cut oddly. It does not look to have a good finish. And colour is not really what it says on the image or description. Won't recommend this product. Instead go for a different Merrell product.
customer_reviews.author: Pub

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of boots. Straight out of the book I did a 20 mile hike, held up to hills, streams and climbing. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mdscalv

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be watertight, (walked through 2" of water). Easy to get on and off, very comfortable, look brilliant. At the moment I cannot fault them - bear in mind only been an owner for 2 weeks at time of this review.
customer_reviews.author: J. BYWATER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The reason I keep on buying Merrell is that they fit my feet perfectly, both in size and shape. Haven't worn them out in any adverse conditions as yet but am sure they will be as good as all the other pairs I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baynes

customer_reviews.title: fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: a great boot from merrell, I wear them at work for 10 hours a day, very very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit fine and looking forward to many walks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: These are very light weight and and have not worn well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, fit was great and after a couple of short walks were nicely broken in for longer rambles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots but buy big
customer_reviews.text: Buy them a half size bigger than your normal fit size and they will l fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Slightly on the small side but still very comfy and didn’t need breaking in
customer_reviews.author: Phil Poole

customer_reviews.title: It is a product with quality's materials.
customer_reviews.text: I liked all of my boots but I think that it will be a llittle bit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: These boots are NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Merrell's for years - and always loved them. I wonder whether these are genuine Merrell - they are NOT waterproof. This is hugely disappointing (as I can't even write to the seller - Amazon - to complain. I started wearing them less than a month ago and they leak even in relatively 'normal' rainy conditions. I have NOT waded through deep water, taken them for a swim or even gone kayaking in them; just worn them as an 'everyday' shoe and at the first drop of rain - hey presto: wet toes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Grey

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: I was recommend these boots by a friend after raving how comfortable they were and I must agree mine fit like a glove I am a size eight but as recommendations bought size 8.5 and they are perfect. I like the look of these boots and love the laces are not too long so a neater look when tied and they seem well made. We have had some very wet days so been through a fair share of large puddles and they have kept my feet toasty dry. Not a brand I am familiar but very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Try one size larger for an ideal fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort and design; just be sure to order a size larger than your normal footwear size, due to the amount of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fenton

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Cham 7 Limit Mid WTPF High Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: This protective mid hiker features durable suede and waterproof protection so you can push your limits, no matter the distance.
feature_bullets: Performance suede leather and mesh upper. Hook and loop closure system for quick adjustability.
Bellows tongue keeps debris out. Protective rubber toe cap.
Breathable mesh lining. EVA removable footbed.
Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability. EVA midsole for stability and comfort.
Molded nylon arch shank. Flex Index Grade 2.
